title: Google sites
content:
Hello, please i have been reporting this issue a few months ago

The issue is that when i try to use google sites (google/Youtube) the sites just go into Loading mode and they load, they load and they load for quite some time (sometimes 30sec, sometimes 1minute) then they just abruptly stop loading, the tab just sits there doing nothing so again i have to fill my search in google and sometimes it just works and sometimes it loads again and does nothing

I tried using other browsers, they work just fine but i'm used to using Mozilla and i don't want to switch to some other browser

I've got a response to this issue that it is due to google changing/updating some security protocol and Mozilla did not update this, but that was like 4months ago and i am still experiencing this nerve twisting issue

Please help
creator: miroslavhorecky1

title: Firefox email font size different in subject and content
content: I have Firefox 112.0.2 (64-bit) on a Windows 10 PC and I use gmail. In Firefox email writing, the font size in the subject line is larger than the font size in the email text which is set to normal which is too small. I would like to set the text font to be the same as the subject font but the next largest size for the text is large which is too big. Why are the subject and text content fonts different?
creator: David_Dundas

title: Change Firefox profile Language
content: I was in italy when I first created my firefox account and by default it choose italian as language. All of my search results are in italian even though in browser settings I choose English as preffered language. Now I discovered that actually my firefox profile is in italian that's why I see results in italian. In the profile settings (https://accounts.firefox.com/settings), there is no option to change the language. Please help.
creator: gu.singh93

title: Errore all'avvio
content: Molto spesso quando tento di aprire Firefox (versione 112.0.2 (64 bit)) mi compare la finestra allegata. La chiudo, riprovo e ricompare. Poi dopo enne tentativi si apre Firefox ma non carica nulla e si inchioda. Come fare? Grazie.
creator: passegua

title: MY LOGINS AND PASSWORD NOT RESTORED
content: AFTER FORMOTTING MY PC I HAVE LOGGED IN FIRE FOX . BUT MY OLD LOGINS AND PASSWORDS NOT REESTORED. WORST SERVICE
creator: acts.rufus

title: Saved logins - list with spurious suggestions - how to clean-up ?
content:
Hello,

Minor issue but some help would still be much appreciated here.

On some sites, when I click the login field, Firefox suggests a list of possible identifiers. Among the suggestions there is one that is the true identifier I need to use the others are mis-typos that I probably have typed in error some time in the past.

I want to clean-up that list to keep just the true identifier. How do I do that ?

When I go to Settings > Passwords I only see the true login identifier. The other items in the list of suggestions do not appear. So it seems that it is not there that I must do the cleaning-up â€¦

[I am appending an example with a list of login identifiers that Firefox suggests (the correct identifier is the last in the list) and the information that is stored in Passwords (only the true identifier is listed).]

Many thanks.
creator: nuno_ferreira

title: My Website Glitz Cleaner shows "ssl_error_bad_cert_domain"
content: I was unable to open my website Glitz Cleaner in Firefox Browser. I was getting error "ssl_error_bad_cert_domain". Kindly help how to resolve this issue. I talked to hosting company they said SSL is active from their end. Is this browser issue or hosting issue?

content: I checked cookies and data recently and noticed this cookie listed about.ef2a7dd5-93bc-417f-a698-142c3116864f.mozilla and I cannot seem to delete it I think it appeared when I accidentally clicked reader view what is it? I tried searching and found a similar question https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/1372671 and google search seems to mention tor for some reason any help please?
creator: joshkney

title: Use of Primary Password has been changed!
content:
Primary Password is suppose to be prompted "once for each Firefox session, when Firefox needs access to your stored passwords."

In the latest 112.0.2 (64-bit) release, this feature no longer works. When I restart a new Firefox session, it immediately accesses webpages and accounts and automatically logs you in, without ever confirming the Primary Password.

Even when FF does ask you for the Primary Password, if you click on x and ignore the request, FF happily goes on and logs in to all secure sites without prompting a password.

This is a serious security problem! If I shutdown a laptop or quit out of Firefox, I don't want someone else to be able to power up the computer, launch the browser and have automatic access to all of my accounts, email, etc.

Thanks for looking into this and fixing it. Keep up the good work.
creator: lincolnhu

title: Firefox no sound on Youtube videos on a Windows 11 notebook
content: Firefox no sound on Youtube videos on a Windows 11 notebook. Youtube sound on other browsers is working well.
creator: phil1420h2

title: Firefox Tabs and App Crashing Constantly
content:
My Firefox crashes almost constantly, up to several times every couple minutes. I recently wiped my entire computer and reinstalled Windows (to fix other problems, among this one) but the issue is still happening. I have a list of a couple dozen crash logs that I can show, and I have tried reading through them and debugging to no avail. The crashes also still persist in Troubleshoot mode.
